name: ZYPHER
description:
Hi its my first full game ihope you will like it

ididnt explaine well in the game but its easy to get the idea 

you have tow things to get know:-

One ; avoiding in ship form that by press W and S

Tow : Avoid and kill monsters in inside ship form that will changed automatic and the mechanics will get change to W S A D for movement and leftclickto shot + aim with amouse / i hope you will get it right thank you and sorry about my english its not my main language.
